data.text: @krobbus it is not irresponsable, they just travel. In Disney, you can already take off your mask. Those cases are not people that are going to the hospital, cases don’t mean anything, you need to look at the people that are at the hospital

@krobbus if they are allowed to travel, then they can. From someone that is living in France, Covid is at its end (for now) we can take off masks outside and in 4 days we will be allowed to do the same inside

and before anyone says i’m picking and choosing when to be mad about cc’s not following guidelines i wish the worst on any and every cc that’s travelled unnecessarily during the pandemic, fav or not you’re still an asshole
they acknowledge that their actions are bad but then continue to do them regardless, it’s stupid. it’s empty words they say to get people to not question it.
no masks at the airport? not even on your chin or around your wrist? are you serious? https://t.co/tVd8WWSBLf

wilbur, tommy, and phil are being incredibly selfish to put their lives and other peoples lives at risk for a vlog. flying to a covid hotspot for a vlog can wait till there wasn’t an outbreak in the last week.
